title: Cable Rope High Pulley Overhead Tricep Extension

items: Attach a rope to the high pulley of a cable machine.
Stand facing away from the machine and grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing each other.
Bring your hands up to your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Extend your arms upward, straightening your elbows and contracting your triceps.
Lower the rope back down to your head, keeping your elbows in the same position.
Repeat for desired number of reps.
Targets the triceps muscles, which are responsible for extending the elbow joint
Helps to build strength and definition in the triceps
Improves overall upper body strength and stability
Can be easily modified to target different areas of the triceps muscle
Allows for a full range of motion, which can help to prevent injury and improve flexibility
Triceps brachii
Anconeus
